name: Snow-Boy Rescue Challenge 2015 - Arctic Fun Winter Christmas Party Games
name_original: Snow-Boy Rescue Challenge 2015 - Arctic Fun Winter Christmas Party Games
description: what would be better than playing with the snow in the summer time, Tap on the snow flakes to melt them and save your boy from freezing, see how far you can go before the boy turns into complete frost, watch the thermometer next to you, if the temperature drops too deep make sure you get all the flakes tapped and you will set on a fire and raise the temperature. Simple fun game to play, compare your top score to your friends on the leaderboard
